text: "Love Will Lead You Back" is a 1990 song by Taylor Dayne and is the second single from her second studio album Can't Fight Fate. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 68 in the United Kingdom, number 11 in Australia, number 28 in New Zealand and number 2 in Canada. It was covered by Yuri, Johnny Mathis and Patti LaBelle. title: Love Will Lead You Back
